contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Orphan|date=February 2009}} The '''Ukrainian green movement''' is a name for loose group of various governmental and [[non-governmental organisation]]s defending the environment in [[Ukraine]]. ==Members== Members include: *Green party of Ukraine *Panukrainian Ecological League *National Ecological Center *Regional Ecological Center - Kiev *NGO "MAMA-86" {{DEFAULTSORT:Ukrainian Green Movement}} [[Category:Politics of Ukraine]] {{Ukraine-hist-stub}}
